doc:
Harry Watson (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Watson_(actor) 0 (for a vaudeville era actor see Harry Watson, Jr.)
Harry R. Watson (August 31, 1921 – June 8, 2001) was an American child actor, a Coast Guard combat photographer in World War II, and a pioneer in television journalism. ( for a_vaudeville_era_actor see Harry_Watson , Jr. ) Harry_R._Watson ( August_31_,_1921 – June_8_,_2001 ) was an_American_child_actor , a_Coast_Guard_combat_photographer in World_War_II , and a_pioneer in television_journalism .
